name: musketeer
rules: Discard the Pike and return the Musket to its owner's hand Enemy Pike but dies. Advanced Rifling: Rounds 5-6 in addition, the Player who played the Pikeman must discard an additional card of his opponent's choice.

name: pikemen
rules: Beats Calvary without dying. If you beat Calvary, your opponent cannot play Calvary next hand.

name: calvary
rules: Beats Musketeers without dying. If you beat a Musketeer, defeat two more Infantry. If you only have Calvary, you lose the battle.
